name: 青鳥樂園 Blue Bird Land EP.1 上篇
name_original: 青鳥樂園 Blue Bird Land EP.1 上篇
description:
Blue Bird Land is an AVG with horror and puzzle elements.
There are two chapters in episode 1.
Each level in the chapter is different,
the form of the game is unique from others.

As the captivating story unfolding,
you can enjoy the creepy pictures and scary atmosphere,
having fun solving the exciting and interactive puzzles.

Let’s follow the alluring characters,
addicted to the dangerous amusement park.


★Different challenges and puzzles, every part is a new surprise.
★Interesting plot with more than 10000 words.
★Special art, mixing western fantastic elements.
★Attractive art and music, an immersive experience



Brought by fate, only some people can follow the blue bird,
the envoy, entering the amusement park—Blue Bird Land.
Once the risk of losing your soul is accepted,
Blue Bird Land will kill someone for you.

Vivina, a young girl, enters Blue Bird Land with absolute determination,
challenging various weird difficulties set by devils.
Can she realize her wish, leave Blue Bird Land with her soul,
and embrace the new dawn?



Hello, I'm Can-Yue (C.moon), a Taiwanese.
I set up an independent game studio—Dark Light Studio,
and now I’m developing an indie game—Blue Bird Land.


【EP.1】



It's bustling with noise and joy;
however, Vivina's eye is caught by a different place.
It's an opera house, classical, a bit ancient, and pretty quiet.

The magician's waiting for his prey inside.

The clowns and puppets are snickering.
Facing their deceits and puzzles,
Will she succeed? Or she's doomed to be swallowed by shadows?



After passing the challenge of the opera house,
Vivina stands in front of a strange mansion.
It's dark and a bit shabby.

She sees shadows of bugs and hears the voice of stretching legs.
There are ghosts wandering and whispering eulogy.

The boy opens the door to invite his guest.

【EP.2】



The young lady sings,
sewing her doll.
"Come become my doll."
"I will love you."
She smiles.
The dolls in Doll House surround Vivina.



Vivina believes his "promise".
Once she succeeds in Casino, her soul will be back.

But will things go as well as she believes?
Devils are reveling in Casino.
One of them walks towards Vivina with an evil smile.
